description: The code is replacing the cipher algorithm with a weaker one (DES) after obtaining the instance using AES/GCM/NoPadding. This can lead to the use of an insecure encryption algorithm, potentially weakening the security of the application.
recommendation: Modify the code to use a secure algorithm from the beginning, and do not replace it with a weaker algorithm. Always choose algorithms that are recommended for security use, such as AES/GCM/NoPadding.
